latex:
If $ a > 1$, then the sum of the real solutions of \[\sqrt{a - \sqrt{a + x}} = x\] is equal to\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \sqrt{a} - 1\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ \frac{\sqrt{a} - 1}{2}\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ \sqrt{a - 1}\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ \frac{\sqrt{a - 1}}{2}\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ \frac{\sqrt{4a - 3} - 1}{2}$
